EsriWorldImagery_jpg description: Esri World Imagery is a global basemap provided by Esri, offering high-resolution satellite and aerial imagery for use in mapping and geographic information systems (GIS). Learn more
nicfi_jpg description: Norwegian International Climate and Forest Initiative (NICFI), in collaboration with satellite imagery provider Planet, offers free, high-resolution satellite data of the world's tropical forests to support efforts to reduce deforestation and monitor environmental changes. Learn more
sentinel_jpg description: Sentinel-2 is a joint European Union (EU) and European Space Agency (ESA) Earth observation programme that provides free, global access to high-resolution satellite imagery of the Earth's land surface. It is designed to monitor land cover, land use, and environmental changes, including vegetation health, water resources, and urban areas. Learn more
